what: Add TopicScoreMatrix to ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject — scoreGeneByPeak
title: Add TopicScoreMatrix to ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject — scoreGeneByPeak
text: function, sample, independently compute sums score tile per cell infer gene topic scores. function adapted addGeneScoreMatrix function  ArchR package.

title: Add TopicScoreMatrix to ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject — scoreGeneByPeak
code: scoreGeneByPeak(   genes = NULL,   peaks = NULL,   scoreMat = NULL,   geneModel = "exp(-abs(x)/5000) + exp(-1)",   peakWidth = 500,   method = "sum",   extendUpstream = c(1000, 1e+05),   extendDownstream = c(1000, 1e+05),   geneUpstream = 5000,   geneDownstream = 0,   useGeneBoundaries = TRUE,   useTSS = FALSE,   extendTSS = FALSE,   geneScaleFactor = 5,   excludeChr = c("chrY", "chrM"),   blacklist = NULL,   subThreads = 1,   tstart = NULL,   logFile = NULL )

title: Add TopicScoreMatrix to ArrowFiles or an ArchRProject — scoreGeneByPeak
text: genes stranded GRanges object containing ranges associated gene start end coordinates. peaks GRanges object containing peaks score column calculate gene-level scores. scoreMat  geneModel string giving "gene model function" used weighting peaks gene score calculation. string function x, x stranded distance transcription start site gene. extendUpstream minimum maximum number basepairs upstream transcription start site consider gene activity score calculation. extendDownstream minimum maximum number basepairs downstream transcription start site transcription termination site (based 'useTSS') consider gene activity score calculation. geneUpstream integer describing number bp upstream gene extend gene body. effectively makes gene body larger proximal peaks weighted equally gene body. parameter used 'useTSS=FALSE'. geneDownstream integer describing number bp downstream gene extend gene body.effectively makes gene body larger proximal peaks weighted equally gene body. parameter used 'useTSS=FALSE'. useGeneBoundaries boolean value indicating whether gene boundaries employed gene activity score calculation. Gene boundaries refers process preventing tiles contributing gene score given gene second gene's transcription start site tile gene interest. useTSS boolean describing whether build gene model based gene TSS gene body. extendTSS boolean describing whether extend gene TSS. default useTSS uses 1bp TSS parameter enables extension region 'geneUpstream' 'geneDownstream' respectively. geneScaleFactor numeric scaling factor weight genes based inverse length .e. (Scale Factor)/(Gene Length). scaled 1 scale factor. Small genes scale factor extremely large genes closer 1. scaling helps relative gene score value. excludeChr character vector containing seqnames chromosomes excluded analysis. blacklist GRanges object containing genomic regions blacklist may extremeley -represented thus biasing geneScores genes nearby locus. subThreads  tstart  logFile path file used logging ArchR output. matrixName name used storage gene activity score matrix provided ArchRProject ArrowFiles. force boolean value indicating whether force matrix indicated matrixName overwritten already exist given input.
